trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging" />, <see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged" />, <see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleting" />, and <see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleted" /> events of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging" /> 之 <see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged" />、<see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleting" />、<see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleted" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每當事件發生時，直到您移除委派，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a <xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventHandler> and the procedure to handle the event when a row is changed.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將<xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventHandler>和處理事件的資料列變更時，程序。

trans-unit.source: The procedure prints the action and value of the changed row.
trans-unit.target: 此程序會列印的動作和變更資料列的值。
